channel.title: [Class Suggestion] The Informant
channel.description:
Alignment: neutral type: investigative goal: survive
**Freelance** (night, infinite uses, select two targets) reveal the first player's class type to yourself and the second target . If the second player is a support type, you will be immune to death tonight (you will not be informed of this, unless you are attacked)
you will see "_your target is an x class_" while the second target will see _"the rogue tells you that first name last name [number] is an x class!"_
**Interrogate** (night, 1 uses) determine your target's faction [the mastermind will appear blue dragon this way nights 1-3; they will be seen as cult/unseen (whichever is in game) if they are framed by the scorned tonight].
**Determine status** (day, 2 uses) determine if your target has royal blood.
------------------- Lore: Something about being the younger sibling of an observer, or used to be observer
Additional information: looking for something to replace "determine status**. And yes, I did make this class in a few minutes :3

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Informant
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
ThePlex:

Editing quotes can be seen as fraudulent behaviour and therefore, you might want to stop… also because trolling threads is not a good idea.

I’m trolling my own thread?

Also, we are clearly joking.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Informant
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
ThePlex:

The way you’re making this sound is if you want this to be BD oriented but it is more harmful to BD to keep alive in the long run.

No, he can help unseen/cult if he randomly does it or he figures out who a support type is through his investigations and they happen to be cult/unseen or later be converted.

ThePlex:

I’m talking about the BD classes that are revealed…

He doesn’t reveal the blue dragon, only there type (which, if blue dragon lynch him, he reveals more in his journal). The only BD classes that should fear him are psychic, noble, and prince.

Hippolytus:

Cool spelling bro

you faked that!

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Informant
item.dc:creator: ThePlex
item.description:
RopeStringFace:

They provide info to the BD. Also, the way this class works is you don’t have to reveal yourself to gain protection and give other players info.

The way you’re making this sound is if you want this to be BD oriented but it is more harmful to BD to keep alive in the long run.

RopeStringFace:

He doesn’t have a converted version, which was implied when I provided no unseen version.

I’m talking about the BD classes that are revealed…

Read full topic

I hacked the survey so everyoen said they wanted neutral investigatives! muhahahah pls ban me

:0
Also, you misspelled “everyone”

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Informant
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
ThePlex:

There’s no real reason to keep them alive.

They provide info to the BD. Also, the way this class works is you don’t have to reveal yourself to gain protection and give other players info.

ThePlex:

they’ll most likely end up converted

He doesn’t have a converted version, which was implied when I provided no unseen version.

ThePlex:

A Neutral with info is a dangerous person. Becomes a target.

That is your logic right?

I don’t kill neutral’s on the spot, unless I am a knight (as prince, I test if alchs are real with blur, then tell them to heal me).

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Informant
item.dc:creator: Hippolytus
item.description:
Neutral Investigatives are cool though that is why I did like 15 of those surveys saying I wanted a new neutral Investigative

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Informant
item.dc:creator: ThePlex
item.description:
The reason Neutral Investigative don’t work is simple.

There’s no real reason to keep them alive. BD will want to get rid of it since it can pretty much reveal BD classes to scum and they’ll most likely end up converted or reveal who Prince potentially could be etc.

A Neutral with info is a dangerous person. Becomes a target.

That is your logic right?

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Informant
item.dc:creator: Hippolytus
item.description:
The reason he can find royal blood is so he can find Prince and therefore be helpful to evil roles. Otherwise he would be pretty much purely BD sided.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Informant
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
Hippolytus:

I do not quite get the point of the becoming Immune on a Support

the point: you provide the support info (they could be unseen/cult) and they provide you protection. I did not want to say “and they have to use their supportive ability on you” because then you are just turning supportive types into investigators.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Informant
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
ThePlex:

Because why not right?

because they defend you, also he needs some way to defend himself.

ThePlex:

So like the Princess but Neutral?

except reveals the actual class type, instead of two. Also he has no royal blood.

ThePlex:

So like the Psychic but Neutral?

Psychic no longer has “vision”

ThePlex:

So like a little like Ruby’s maid but Neutral?

I never read “ruby’s maid”. Please link me the post.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Informant
item.dc:creator: Hippolytus
item.description:
I do not quite get the point of the becoming Immune on a Support but otherwise it is decent.

Read full topic

So like the Psychic but Neutral?

So like a little like Ruby’s maid but Neutral?

Determine status (day, 2 uses) determine if your target has royal blood.
